description:
Sad news "American Horror Story" fans, Emma Robert and Evan Peters have called off their engagement and broken up. 给《美国恐怖故事》的粉丝们带来一个难过的消息，该剧的两位影星Emma Roberts和Evan Peters的订婚关系已经破裂。

Just Jared reports the stars, who have been dating for three years, have amicably split and are still friends. Just Jard网站报道，这两位影星之前曾经恋爱3年，现在的他们已经和平分手，仍然还是朋友。

The pair, who co-starred in two seasons of "American Horror Story" together, started dating in 2012 and got engaged over Christmas 2014. Roberts is currently shooting Ryan Murphy's new series "Scream Queens," while Peters is in the midst of filming "X-Men: Apocalypse."他们俩曾经在《美国恐怖故事》中一起演出过，在2012年开始恋爱，并在2014年的圣诞节订婚。Roberts现在正在拍摄Ryan Murphy的新剧《尖叫女王》，而Peters则正在拍摄电影《X-Men: Apocalypse》。

Roberts has reportedly been seen not wearing her engagement ring during a night out. The last picture of the couple she shared on social media was when they celebrated Valentine's Day. 据报道，Roberts在晚间出门的时候被发现已经取下了她的订婚戒指。而这对情侣上一次在社交网站上发布合照还是在情人节的时候。
